channel.title: Blocked port?
channel.description: Hi, I hosted a server for like 6 months and now I'm working on a new one. But when I try to show it to a player, he say the client is not loading, its like if the server is offline.. The firewall is down and portforwarded and I port forwarded before, i hosted it before and players played with no problems! Something block my 43594, I dled utorrent when the server was down.... But i uninstalled it and canyouseeme.org say its still down! What should i do??

item.title: Blocked port?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

dude!! U didn’t read!! I already got a server working and already port forwarded! I just coded a new source and ppl can’t get on!! I can with local host and port 43594! I try to connect to my ip and it’s not working! Just read my post! I said all!

Read full topic

item.title: Blocked port?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

laurent 248:

Dude… It’s the same computer and ip and ALL!! It won’t see anything! The only change : the driver can’t see my router!! I’m not a noob… Anyway I will test with another source…

If your not a noob, then you shouldn’t have a problem with a blocked port, setting up a server is one of the easiest tasks you can do other then opening a note pad.

Read full topic

item.title: Blocked port?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Dude… It’s the same computer and ip and ALL!! It won’t see anything! The only change : the driver can’t see my router!! I’m not a noob… Anyway I will test with another source…

Read full topic

item.title: Blocked port?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If your IP address changed you will need to re-port-forward on your router as it is still set to your old IP.

EDIT: Also make sure you are running your server at the time you are testing the port, if not then that might be the problem.

Read full topic

But when I try to show it to a player, he say the client is not loading, its like if the server is offline… The firewall is down and portforwarded and I port forwarded before, i hosted it before and players played with no problems!
